alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Meade County through 1145 PM MDT... At 1108 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Union Center, or 36 miles east of Sturgis, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Union Center around 1125 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Enning. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
